description:
Final preparations abound on all sides and multiple plots start to come together! But can Sanji keep his nerve and go through with the plan? Or will Pudding`s beauty prove too enchanting?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Schein trügt – Sanjis und Puddings Einzug!
Le prétendu couple. L`entrée de Sanji et de Pudding !
The Broken Couple! Sanji and Pudding Enter!
Фальшивая пара! Появление Санджи и Пудинг!
仮面夫婦 サンジ♥プリン入場!
